item.title: What I Learned in DSBA-5122
item.description: Introduction to R and GGPLOT2 On week 1 we learned what is visual analytics and about the power of R and the different libraries R has to offer to make our lives easier to develop powerful visualizations. and how easy it is to create a visualization in R. We lear how easy it is to work with data in DPLYR and how to create a simple visualization in GGPLOT2.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
